example.sklearn_train module

example.sklearn_train.evaluate_xgboost_model(X, y, number_of_cross_val_folds=5, max_depth=6, learning_rate=0.3, min_split_loss=0)[source]
example.sklearn_train.get_data()[source]

Load sklearn wine dataset, and scale features to be zero mean, unit variance. One hot encode labels (3 classes), to be used by sklearn OneVsRestClassifier.
